channel.title: RUNIQUE RSPS l 508 l Source coded from Scratch!
channel.description:
[center][center]THE DEFINITION OF RSPS[/center] [size=12pt][color=green][b][center]15 Players Online Currently! Saturday, 15th! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2nnbc8.png[/img]
[img]http://equillium.org/images/toplinks/forums.png[/img][SIZE=4][URL=http://"http://runique.ca/"]Forums[/URL] ~ [img]http://equillium.org/images/toplinks/play.png[/img][URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/227915652/Runique.jar"]Downloable Client[/URL] ~ [img]http://equillium.org/images/toplinks/download.png[/img][URL=http://"http://runique.ca/play.html"]Web Client[/URL] [/SIZE]
Introduction
Runique is an RSPS unlike any other, our [B]Players[/B] and [B]Economy[/B] is our first priority. Runique wasn't created for the purposes of money. My goal is to create an RSPS that introduces new concepts and innovative ideas that will change the RSPS experience forever. A server than even the owner will want to play.
[CENTER][B][I][U][SIZE=5]Whats Unique About Runique?[/SIZE][/U][/I][/B][/CENTER]
[B][SIZE=4]Below I have provided you screenshots of some in-game content. I won't list a bunch of details here, find out by giving Runique a chance to bring back your childhood memories and create a true RSPS experience. [/SIZE][/B]
[CENTER] UNIQUE HOME ( Custom Home Will Begin Development In A Week )[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/atxfv7.png[/img]
[CENTER] UNIQUE STARTER ZONE! [/CENTER] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/20igufs.jpg[/img]
[CENTER] TONS OF BASIC RUNESCAPE CONTENT [/CENTER] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/8ygjl3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/vo4gic.png[/img] [B][SIZE=4] Hunger games are currently in development! Better get them fire making levels up, you'll need it when night falls. No you haven't seen hunger games done correctly, yet.[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/24pc7c0.png[/img][/center]

item.dc:creator: @Mystic-Effect Mystic-Effect
item.description:
@Mystic-Effect wrote:

Runique.ca is currently transferring webhosts, site will be up within 24-48 hours. This is being done so we can implement our highscores, voting and automated donation systems.

Next Update In-game: Hunger Games

Contact me if you have any questions, Thanks.
